channel.title: People can't login on my server
channel.description: Hey, i have hamachi and my friend is in my network and i gave him my hamachi ip and my server is running cause i can login, but he cant login into my server.. what's the problem?

item.title: People can't login on my server
item.dc:creator: @chase_scape chase scape
item.description:
@chase_scape wrote:

[quote=“tw33zy, post:9, topic:270931”]Yeh, but it’s ‘N’ technology basically it has a speed of 200+, when G and B arrange from 10MB - 100GB
And it’s more reliable with three ariels[/quote] I’m not saying your wrong I’m saying u could buy a modem or a router that is a price of shit and it would still work

Read full topic

IP address from hamachi into the Server IP and should beable to login with no problems.

item.title: People can't login on my server
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

i dont know, i dont use hamachi…and it shouldnt matter if your on a laptop or not, if you have a router and you are wirelessly connected to it, then you can portfoward it.

Read full topic
item.source: People can't login on my server

item.title: People can't login on my server
item.dc:creator: @chase_scape chase scape
item.description:
@chase_scape wrote:

[quote=“pkforlol3, post:4, topic:270931”]i can’t portforward since im on my laptop and the only way is neighbours, lol…
but ppl could login into my serv when they were before in my hamachi network…
but they cant go into my server now… whats the problem?[/quote]
i used to have hamachi. soo make sure your server is turned on and make sure you can compile your files ok if you cant theres your problem and i also noticed some server sources dont work for my computer you should try that to but for the most party i think the other guys were right hamachi sucks and if you can talk your parents or someone to getting you a router and a wifi box

Read full topic
